TopicTitle: Center of lift is pointing slightly sidways. (Need help.)

Articles.Content:
Does anyone know what causes this? I think the parts are all symmetrical. But if I put the aircraft the long way the center of lift is not straight. Is this a parts problem or some part of the game?

It is straight when facing forwards, but off to the side when turned 90 degrees sideways.

FYI, the aero parts are normally tilted on another access to make a rhomboid shape. But it does not change the nature of the center of lift being off. I put them straight up for diagnostic purposes.
